comment.author: 94213629@N00
comment._content: There is something about this picture that strikes me. It's obvious that in 1853 shutter speeds were long and thus she had to stay still. What really strikes me is the unseen mother showing her love through just holding her girl's hand.

comment.author: 14880328@N02
comment._content:
the hand, just the hand, is really an interesting touch to the composition\
the girl looks like she came straight from an Adam's family album

comment._content: we've featured this picture in the very excellent wordpress blog of very excellent images, PINGERE - www.pingere.wordpress.com/

comment.author: 7912554@N05
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Playthings of the Past: Antique Photos of Dolls, Toys, & Games, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
